acceptance_criteria:
- GET /api/ticks returns JSON array
- Each tick has computed 'column' field
- Query param ?status=open works
- Query param ?awaiting=approval works
- Empty array for no matches
closed_reason: Added GET /api/ticks endpoint with query param filters (status, awaiting, type, parent), computed isBlocked and column fields. Column logic assigns ticks to backlog/ready/agent/review/input/rejected/done based on status, priority, blocking, and awaiting state. Modified server.go and server_test.go.
description:
GET /api/ticks endpoint:
- Returns all ticks as JSON
- Query params: status, awaiting, type, parent
- Includes computed fields: isBlocked, column assignment
- Column logic:
  - backlog: open + (blocked OR priority>=3)
  - ready: open + unblocked + !awaiting
  - agent: in_progress + !awaiting
  - review: awaiting in (approval,review,content,work)
  - input: awaiting in (input,escalation,checkpoint)
  - rejected: verdict=rejected + open
  - done: closed
title: API: List ticks with filters
